name: Gyakuten Hanafuda
storyline:
The game features 2 modes, free battle mode and league battle mode.

In free battle mode, the player plays against the characters Maya Fey, Mia Fey, and Franziska von Karma, and in league battle mode, the player plays a "brute force league match" with all characters.
summary: Gyakuten Hanafuda is an Ace Attorney-themed hanafuda video game featuring Maya Fey, Mia Fey, and Franziska von Karma.
